product_name: Salomon Pearl Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Get to the lift quick! The Salomon Pearl Boa snowboard boots go on easily and feature a fast, secure and easy-to-use Boa lacing sytem so you can dial in your fit quick and get to the slopes.
short_description: Get to the lift quick! The Salomon Pearl Boa snowboard boots go on easily and feature a fast, secure and easy-to-use Boa lacing sytem so you can dial in your fit quick and get to the slopes.
